string-array.name: violations
string-array.item: Any Violation of General Driving Rules
Disobedience of Official Traffic Control Signal
Disobedience of Official Traffic Road or Pavement Markings
Disobedience of Official Traffic Signals and Instructions
Driving a Motor Vehicle while under influence of Liquor or Incapacitating Drugs
Driving Through Funeral or Other Processions
Erection and Interference with Traffic Control Items
Exceeding Gross Weight, Axle and Weight Loads
Improper Movement to or from Parking Area
Improper Opening Doors and Alighting from Vehicles
Installing, mounting, fitting engine not according to locally-approved standards
Loading/unloading at Loading Zone without the presence of driver
Loading/unloading of passengers in private garage
Loading/unloading of passengers of PUJ in undesignated zone
Movement of Trailers, Trucks, or any Approved Transportation Medium Linked to a Container Van
No permit to Move Equipment and/or Load of Excessive Weight, Width, or Height
Non-embedding the PCCN by the owner/operator of shop
Non-turning on the headlight while driving along city roads and highways
Non-wearing and/or no safety helmet for motorcyclist
Not Giving Way at Roundabouts or Rotundas
Obstructing Roads or Sidewalks by Person, Motor vehicles, including stalled Vehicles
Obstruction to Drivers View or Driving Mechanism
Opening Doors and Alighting from Public Utility Bus
Operating a Bicycle and Animal-drawn Carriage on Public Roads
Operating Animal-drawn Carriages, and Bicycles that are not Licensed
Operating without approved traffic impact assessment
Owner/driver with no PCCN on the fabricated/manufacture body of the MTH
Owner/driver with no PCCN on the fabricated/manufacture body of the Pedicab
Owner/driver with no PCCN on the fabricated/manufacture body of the PUJ
Parking on Parade Routes and on Any Special Occasion
Parking, Waiting, or Standing in Prohibited Area
Passing of Vehicles over Five Tons on Subdivision Road Already Converted to City Street
Private Garage for Vehicles-for-Hire without permit
Public Transport Utility Vehicle with more than Eighteen Passengers passing Secondary Streets
PUV not in accordance with approved standards
Refusal to have Vehicles Weighed and/or Remove Excess Load
Truck Ban, Non-Complying Buses and Jeepneys
Violating Operating Rule on One-way Streets
Violating Operation of Public Utility Jeepneys
Violating Operation of Student Carpool Transport Service
Violating Requirement of Transport/Traffic Impact Assessment
Violating Restrictions of Animals and Livestock on Roads
Violation of non-compliance regarding security guards, CCTV, facilities, etc
Violation of off-street public utility van transport terminal
Violation of Operating Conditions of Motorized Tricycle-for-hire
Violation of Procedure Involving Traffic Incidents
Violation of restriction or limits in the use of bridge
Violation or non-compliance with any section of Article XIX regarding seatbelt
Violation or non-compliance with any Section of Article XVIII regarding lighting, warning signs, equipment, etc
Violations in Public Pay Parking Area

resources.string: This app need to access files on your device.
